SELECT T.KHDXDH,T.TJRQ,T.KHH,T.KHMC,T.ZHBS,SUM(T.ZHYE) ZHYE
,SUM(T.BHYE) BHJE
,COALESCE(GZKH.GZZT,'0') AS SFGZ,T.BZ FROM $tableName$ T LEFT JOIN MPAS_SZ_GRGZKH GZKH ON GZKH.KHH=T.KHH AND GZKH.KHDXDH=T.KHDXDH where T.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND T.TJRQ=$tjrq$
T.ZHBS='$zhbs$'
GROUP BY T.KHDXDH,T.TJRQ,T.KHH,T.KHMC,T.ZHBS,GZKH.GZZT ,T.BZ ORDER BY SUM(T.ZHYE) DESC
